subSections.title: Kanji
subSections.text:
{{ja-kanji|grade=8|rs=木03}}

# careless
# woods; grove
# Chinese family name "Du"

subSections.title: Readings
Compounds
Derived terms
subSections.text:
* {{ja-r|杜撰脱漏|ずさんだつろう}}: careless (slipshod) and with many omissions
* {{ja-r|杜の都|もり の みやこ}}: lit. City of Trees. Nickname for [[w:Sendai, Japan|Sendai, Japan]]
* {{ja-r|鎮守の杜|ちんじゅ の もり}}: [[grove]] of the [[village]] [[shrine]]
